content:
This is my latest proposal for the booth title and bullets Automate Zero Trust Governance

• Zero Trust Administration for Azure, Exchange Online, and Application Onboarding
• Converged Identity Fabric Platform with Modular Licensing for IGA, Access Management, and PAM
• Identity Orchestrations Automate your Unique Business Processes
• RBAC and PBAC Hybrid Admin and Runtime Authorization Management
• Cross-System Risk Management for SAP, Azure, and Other Environments
